group_1.textRight: To start us off, let me explain the basics of@Magical Kirin, the girl who steals your heart!

group_1.textLeft: Um, I need to point out that I'm more interested@in how it handles portraits, not the story…

group_1.textRight: We're getting to that…
MagiKiri is a Bible, but there's a specific order@to learning it.
Besides, you need to understand the character's@traits in order to improve your portrait skills.
And for that, you need to know what this Bible@is all about!

group_1.textLeft: So while it is an introductory text, it must be@approached in a particular way.

group_1.textRight: Precisely!

group_1.textLeft: I understand, then. Lead on.

group_1.textRight: Magical Kirin, the Phantom Thief, defender@of the weak…
As you can guess, this character is the main@subject of the story!

group_1.textLeft: …I see. I think I have a general grasp of things.

group_1.textRight: Alright, so next, you have to consider what@your subject would be like in MagiKiri.
Imagine them in the story and apply it@to your art!
Oh, I'm Kirin, of course.
My Magical Girl form is drawn from her too!
You gotta see my inspiration!@Here, lemme show you!

group_1.textLeft: Is it really okay for you to transform in@broad daylight?

group_1.textRight: Mm…
No one else is here, so it's fine!
And whenever I get caught, I just say that I'm@cosplaying, and that takes care of everything.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, so you've been caught before…

group_1.textRight: Anyway, here's my outfit!

group_1.textLeft: It…makes me think of Halloween in some ways.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101200:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Exactly! You're a great student!
Alright, alright, now let's broaden your@imagination!
So you want to draw Chisato, your superior…
The first step is imagining what kind of@character she'd be in MagiKiri!
That'll definitely make the portrait eye-catching@and easy to understand.
And it'll make it clear what kind of person@you're trying to express!

group_1.textLeft: …Chisato would be like a mid-boss.

group_1.textRight: Hmm hmm, I see what you mean.

group_1.textLeft: Who…do you think I would be?

group_1.textRight: Hmm… You, Takina…
You're a cool older girl, so I think you'd be@great as a gunslinger!

group_1.textLeft: …Um, have I told you that about myself?

group_1.textRight: Hm…? What was that?

group_1.textCenter: (She guessed my identity just by looking@at me…?)
(I was getting worried there because all she@was talking about was that manga of hers,)
(but perhaps she truly is a master artist.)
(I must work hard, then…so that I can improve@my drawing skills.)

group_1.textRight: Okay, now let's act out our roles!

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: Naahahaha!
I am the Phantom Thief girl, Magical Kirin!
I give treasure to the weak!
I'm under attack!

group_1.textLeft: B…bang.

group_1.textRight: Takina, you gotta speak up!

group_1.textLeft: BANG BANG!
No… Magical Kirin, you mustn't! The treasure is@already in the hands of the enemy!

group_1.textRight: What?! Who's leading them?!

group_1.textLeft: Their boss is named Chisato. She seems to be@a formidable opponent!

group_1.textRight: Then let us join forces!
You've learned to draw amazing portraits.
So it's time for the final boss!@Let's blow Chisato away with your skills!

group_1.textLeft: Yes!

group_1.textRight: …Oh my god, we've gone completely off-track!
We're not here to LARP!@We're here to teach you how to draw!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:406201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh?! You mean this performance wasn't part@of the exercise…?

group_1.textRight: Umm… So long as you can get a clear mental@image, you don't have to act it all out…
But no! By acting things out, you get more@immersed in your imagination!
To demonstrate that, try drawing a picture@of Chisato right here and now!

group_1.textLeft: That's a problem. After all that...
I can only imagine that final boss of our@MagiKiri play, not Chisato…

group_1.textRight: So acting got you TOO deep into the Bible…
The thing is, I don't even know what Chisato@looks like either.
I want you to describe her features to me@so I can sketch a model for you.
That'll help me see the Chisato you're trying@to draw!

group_1.textLeft: Very well.
Chisato is…a very strange person.
She's very lively, too, and…@Well, she's strong.
She's irrational. And she's always smiling and@laughing and talking, and…
One time, she…

group_1.textRight: There you go!

group_1.textLeft: Erm… Is this…the villain from our play…?
Why does she look so evil and muscular?

group_1.textRight: Shoot, I got too deep into our Bible too…
